ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Stupid Names (was Gnome Kabobs) (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Same with Sol Ro.  Now I don t know how Hate is on everybody else s server but on ours, we prefer to do Hate with 10-16 people.  24 is the upper limit of
ygData.messageBody:
Same with Sol Ro. Now I don't know how Hate is on everybody else's server
but on ours, we prefer to do Hate with 10-16 people. 24 is the upper limit
of bearable, but needed for teh Maestro, 30 is considered "annoyingly
crowded."

Saturday morning I logged into Hate and FIFTY FOUR people The lag was so
bad you couldn't move, the SS was so crowded my barb butt couldn't even sit
on the floor!

And this is AFTER the split...............

Tani, 20th, 21st, 20th, 21st, 20th Bard
Halana 50th Shaman
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:jasonf@...]
Sent: Monday, March 13, 2000 8:53 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Stupid Names (was Gnome Kabobs) (OT)


From: "JasonF" <jasonf@...>

Yeah, on Fennin Ro we had some of these back when there were 2,800 people on
the server. When there's that many folks on the game is litterally just
barely playable. You are routinely dropped when zoning (sometimes 70% of
the time).

Laggmonstur has defeated Fenninro in a duel to the death!

Ovurcrowding has deafeated Bandwidth in a duel to the death!

etc. etc.

PS: I'm glad you're still playing Talies.


[48 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

> "Verantinteractv defeats Everyconnction in a duel to the
> death! Everyconnction has fled like a cowardly dog!"
>
> I was rolling ;)
>
> Talies
